deleghe.title: Delegates
deleghe.description: Here you can manage your delegates and your proxies. The first are the natural or legal persons you have authorized to view and manage your notifications, the second are those who have authorized you.
deleghe.delegatorsApiErrorMessage: We were unable to retrieve data regarding your delegates.
deleghe.empty_state: You have not delegated anyone to view your notifications.
deleghe.accept_description: To accept the delegation, enter the code that {{name}} shared with you.
deleghe.revocation_question: Do you really want to revoke the delegation?
deleghe.rejection_question: Do you really want to decline the delegation?
deleghe.error_subtitle: We were unable to load the page. Reload it, or try again later.
deleghe.no_delegates: You have not delegated anyone to view your notifications. <0>Add a delegate</0>
deleghe.no_delegators: You do not have any proxies.
deleghe.show_code_subtitle: Share this code with the authorized representative: they will have to enter it when accepting the delegation. The code is valid for 7 days from the creation of the delegation request.

nuovaDelega.createdDescription: Share the verification code with the delegate: they will have to enter it upon first logging in to SEND and accept your request.
nuovaDelega.title: Add a delegate
nuovaDelega.subtitle: Enter the data of the natural or legal person to whom you want to delegate the reading of your notifications.

form.viewFrom: You will be able to view notifications from*:
form.date-duration: Period of validity of the delegation*
form.endDate-input-aria-label: Enter the end date for the delegation
form.verificationCodeDescr: Share this code with the authorized representative: they will have to enter it when accepting the delegation. The code is valid for 7 days from the creation of the delegation request.

fiscalCode.wrong: The entered tax code is not correct

delivery_mandate_not_found.title: Error
delivery_mandate_not_found.message: This delegation is no longer active.

already_exists.title: Delegation already present
already_exists.message: The person you indicated already has a delegation. Delete it and create a new one.

fiscal_code.title: Invalid tax code
fiscal_code.message: The entered tax code is not valid

invalid_parameter.title: Invalid data
invalid_parameter.message: One or more of the data items entered is invalid
